name: insta-toc
description: Simultaneously generate, update, and maintain a table of contents for your notes in real time.

scripts.dev:log: node esbuild.config.mjs logger && terser -o dist/dev/main.js dist/dev/main.js
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && terser -o dist/build/main.js dist/build/main.js
scripts.upload:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Automated update for version $VERSION"
scripts.upload:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Automated update for version $VERSION"
scripts.upload:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run bump-version && npm run build && git add . && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git commit -m "Automated update for version $VERSION"

author: Nick C.
